metadata.title: CVE-2019-1010004 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
SoX - Sound eXchange 14.4.2 and earlier is affected by: Out-of-bounds Read.The impact is: Denial of Service. The component is: read_samples functionat xa.c:219. The attack vector is: Victim must open specially crafted .xafile. NOTE: this may overlap CVE-2017-18189.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-1010004` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libsox-fmt-all - 14.4.1-5ubuntu0.1
libsox-fmt-alsa - 14.4.1-5ubuntu0.1
libsox-fmt-ao - 14.4.1-5ubuntu0.1
libsox-fmt-base - 14.4.1-5ubuntu0.1
libsox-fmt-mp3 - 14.4.1-5ubuntu0.1
libsox-fmt-oss - 14.4.1-5ubuntu0.1
libsox-fmt-pulse - 14.4.1-5ubuntu0.1
libsox2 - 14.4.1-5ubuntu0.1
sox - 14.4.1-5ubuntu0.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: sox package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '14.4.1-5ubuntu0.1').
